text.tspan: Set of preconfigured / forked libraries for
- Threaded from configuration to web server
- Every dependecy can read what is defined
- Pair of functions for the same
- The set of interceptors are modifiable
If JWT and sessions are mixed, the token
context will be part of the session-data
Defines how the rest of the interceptors
Injects vector of queries into the request
state and provide options for database
Renders database result sets to be send

g.onclick: ; InkWeb.setAtt({el:['text18610'], att:'fill stroke stroke-width', val:'red black 5px'})
